H0.text: Which country overtook the USA as the world's biggest emitter of CO2. India

H1.text: Which country overtook the USA as the world's biggest emitter of CO2. Russia

H2.text: Which country overtook the USA as the world's biggest emitter of CO2. Japan

H3.text: Which country overtook the USA as the world's biggest emitter of CO2. 中国

A4.text: Since 2006, China has been emitting more CO2 than any other country.

A5.text: China has the largest CO2 and GHG emissions in the world.
